items.name: item
items.description: An item you have on hand that you would like to appear in generated scenarios.

class.description: The broad type of item, typically based on where on the body it is worn.

name.description: A short name for the item. This must be unique.

description.description: The description that is displayed to the player

odds.description: The odds that this item will be chosen relative to other items when a scenario is makes a choice among many items. The number is a 'weight', not a percentage. This is useful for emphasizing your favorite items or making your less favorite items appear less frequently.

categories.description: Tag items with the categories they belong in. Scenarios can choose items from categories or exclude categories. Read the scenarios to help figure out how best to tag your items.
